caption.p: Geographic distribution of sampling sites in China. Temperate forests include Genhe (GH), Liangshui (LS), Changbaishan (CBS), Donglingshan (DLS), and Baotianman (BTM); subtropical forests include Gutianshan (GTS), Badagongshan (BDGS), Tiantongshan (TTS), Heishiding (HSD), and Dinghushan (DHS); tropic forests include Nonggang (NG) and Xishuangbanna (XSBN)
